summary: The bill, titled the Rapid Expulsion of Migrant Offenders who Violate and Evade (REMOVE) Act, aims to expedite the removal of aliens. It amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to ensure the Attorney General commences removal proceedings promptly after a Notice to Appear is filed, especially for those convicted of deportable offenses. The bill mandates completion of immigration court proceedings for these individuals within 15 days.
